Emotivna Milojevićeva konferencija: Nemamo banke, a hoćemo da vozimo ferari, to smo mi...
„Bojim se da će u budućnosti razlika biti još veća“, poručio je trener crveno-belih

07 Nov 2019

Crvena zvezda je udarila u zid. Barem u beogradskom meču. Sve viđeno u Londonu, ponovilo se na Marakani. Totenhem je bio brži, jači, agresivniji i spretniji… Crveno-beli nemaju za čim da žale, iako je javnost očekivala još jedan veliki skalp u Ljutice Bogdana.
Trener Vladan Milojević bio je vrlo emotivan, posebno posle konstatacije da se crveno-beli nisu previše trudili.„Sve se vrti oko tog novca… Ne zadovoljavamo se samom činjenicom da smo među 32 ekipe u Evropi. Vidite i da ste danas imali neke katastrofalne rezultate. Galatasaraj je primio šest golova u Madridu. Razlika je velika, bojim se da će u budućnosti biti još veća. Zar vi mislite da oni slučajno hoće da prave zatvorenu ligu. Evo, Totenhem je dobio sedam golova od Bajerna. Šta oni da kažu? Zar vi stvarno ne vidite tu razliku? Oni su dominantni i fizički jači. Ali to smo mi. Nemamo banke, a hoćemo da vozimo ferari“, rekao je Vladan Milojević na zvaničnoj konferenciji za medije.


 Vladan Milojević: Nisam populista, nisam vidovit, ćutimo i radimo


Oštro je Zvezdin strateg stao u odbranu Dušana Jovančića i Njegoša Petrovića za koje je jedan kolega konstatovao da su podbacili.„Teške reči. Kao trener se ne bih složio sa takvom konstatacijom. Njegoš Petrović je jedan od od najtalentovanijih igrača u Srbiji. Kad će da postane igrač, ako ne sad. Prošli put smo stavili nekog drugog, pa smo primili pet golova. Volim svoje igrače, znam koliko im je teško u ovom trenutku. Taj Jovančić je mnogo puta bio ključni igrač. Najveće blago Crvene zvezde su Njegoš Petrović, Velja Nikolić i Krstović. Ako treba neko da plati cenu, ja ću da je platim. Umesto da pričamo o Njegošu kao biseru, mi ćemo sada da ga pogazimo. Zato smo mi takvi kakvi jesmo“.



Kratko i o utakmici.„Čestitke Totenhemu na zasluženoj pobedi. Želeli smo da im skratimo prostore, do kojih oni dolaze tehnikom i brzinom. Imali smo šansu kod 0:0, zatim smo odmah kažnjeni. Posle smo imali još jednu priliku. Više su me zabrinule prinudne izmene. Prvo sa Gobeljićem, pa sa Garsijom. Na kraju ste videli da je Pavkov izašao. Sigurno neprijatna utakmica za nas, ali i iz ovog se uči. Bajern i Totenhem su ekipe iznad nas. Mi tome težimo. Mogu da čestitam igračima i da zahvalim igračima na borbi“.
Ponosan je Milojević zbog jedne stvari.„Pokazali smo da smo dostojanstven klub, i da imamo dostojanstvne navijače. Gosti iz Engleske su imali strahove i predrasude. Ali smo mi poslali lepu sliku u svet“, zaključio je trener Crvene zvezde.

Emotional Milojevic Conference: We don't have a bank, and we want to drive a ferry, it's us ...
"I'm afraid the difference will be even bigger in the future," the Red and White coach said

07 Nov 2019

The red star hit the wall. At least in the Belgrade match. Everything seen in London echoed in Marakana. Tottenham was faster, stronger, more aggressive and agile ... The red-whites had nothing to complain about, though the public was expecting another big scalp in Bogdan's Anger.
Coach Vladan Milojevic was very emotional, especially after noting that the red and whites did not try too hard. You also see that you have had some disastrous results today. Galatasaray conceded six goals in Madrid. The difference is big, I'm afraid it will be even bigger in the future. Do you think they accidentally want to make a closed league? Here, Tottenham got seven goals from Bayern Munich. What should they say? Don't you really see that difference? They are dominant and physically stronger. But that's us. We have no banks, and we want to drive ferries, ”said Vladan Milojevic at an official press conference.


Vladan Milojevic: I am not a populist, I am not clairvoyant, we are silent and we work


The Zvezd strategist sharply stood in defense of Dusan Jovancic and Njegos Petrovic, whom one colleague stated that they had failed. As a coach, I would disagree with such a statement. Njegos Petrovic is one of the most talented players in Serbia. When will he become a player, if not now. Last time we put someone else in, we scored five goals. I love my players, I know how hard it is for them at the moment. That Jovancic has been a key player many times. Red Star's greatest treasures are Njegos Petrovic, Velja Nikolic and Krstovic. If someone has to pay the price, I'll pay it. Instead of talking about Njegos as a pearl, we will now trample him down. That's why we are as we are. "



Short on the match. "Congratulations to Tottenham on their well-deserved victory. We wanted to shorten their spaces, which they reach by technique and speed. We had a chance at 0-0, then we were immediately punished. Afterwards we had another opportunity. I was more concerned about the forced changes. First with Gobeljic, then with Garcia. Eventually you saw Pavkov come out. Certainly an unpleasant match for us, but we learn from this as well. Bayern and Tottenham are the teams above us. We strive for that. I can congratulate the players and thank the players for the fight. "
Milojevic is proud of one thing: "We have shown that we are a dignified club and that we have decent fans. Guests from England had fears and prejudices. But we sent a beautiful picture to the world, "the Red Star coach concluded.
